title: #500NYC Interview – Shai Goldman, Venture Partner, 500 Startups
content: It's our last #500NYC interview of the week! In this episode I speak with Shai Goldman about how he got into venture capital, NYC vs. Silicon Valley, and more. Follow him @Shaig to keep up with everything 500-related in NYC. Listen now:  iTunes Stitcher RSS feed Want to be part of the awesome #500Strong family with founders in NY, Silicon Valley and all around the globe? Apply TODAY to be part of our fall accelerator program – Batch 007!
